resources.string: In order to get article datas, you must require an API key from News API. Please, visit News API\'s website, select the totally free \"Developer\" plan (or any other, but those are not free), and register for the API key. You will get it in e-mail. Please, type the key below!
Please, select news agency and country.

You can scroll the list. Please, click an article title, then the article will be opened in your browser. You can add/delete the article to/from your favorites with the heart icon at the end of the article\'s line. You can reorder the list ascending/descending by title, author and date, just touch the selected column name.

You can scroll the list. Please, click an article title, then the article will be opened in your browser. You can delete an article from your favorites with the red icon at the end of the article\'s line. You can reorder the list ascending/descending by title, author and date, just touch the selected column name.
